faq.q: How is C1 different from B2?
faq.a: C1 is a step up in sophistication and control. You’ll handle abstract topics naturally, use precise language across registers, and communicate confidently in high-stakes professional and academic settings.

faq.q: Which exam should I take for my visa application?
faq.a: It depends on your visa route and the requirement set by the relevant authority. We provide guidance on choosing the appropriate exam and preparation pathway.

faq.q: Can I complete C1 in less than 12 weeks?
faq.a: The recommended pathway is 12–14 weeks for strong outcomes. Intensive options may be possible for learners with a very strong B2 foundation.

faq.q: Do you offer support after the course ends?
faq.a: Yes. We offer post-course consultation, exam booking guidance, and access to ongoing support options where available.
